00001 /* NT_list_obj.h - general linked list class for any type--numerical, pointer or class */

00067 #ifndef _NT_LIST_OBJ_H_
00068 #define _NT_LIST_OBJ_H_
00069 
00070 
00071 #include "nt_main.h"
00072 #include "nt_types.h"
00073 #include "nt_error_obj.h"

00075 
00087 template<class T> class NT_link_list_o
00088 {
00089 public:
00090   NT_link_list_o(const T&, NT_link_list_o<T>*);
00091 
00092 T _info;
00093    NT_link_list_o<T>* _next;
00094 
00095    static const T& defval();
00096 };
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101 template<class T> class NT_iterator_list_o;
00102 
00105 template<class T> class NT_list_o
00106 {
00107 public:
00108    NT_list_o();
00109    void insert_head(T n);
00110    void insert_tail(T n);
00111    void insert(T n);
00112       // insert before current position
00113    T remove(); // remove current position
00114    T& current(); // info of current element
00115    void next(); // advance current position
00116    void reset();
00117    void empty();
00118 
00119    const T& current() const; // info of current element
00120    NTbool at_end() const;
00121    const T& head() const;
00122    const T& tail() const;
00123    int length() const;
00124 
00125    NT_list_o(const NT_list_o<T>&);
00126    const NT_list_o<T>& operator=(const NT_list_o<T>&);
00127    ~NT_list_o();
00128 
00129 private:
00130    void free();
00131    void copy(const NT_list_o<T>&);
00132 
00133    NT_link_list_o<T>* cursor() const { return _pre ? _pre->_next : _head; }
00134 
00135    NT_link_list_o<T>* _head;
00136    NT_link_list_o<T>* _tail;
00137    NT_link_list_o<T>* _pre; // predecessor of cursor
00138    int _len;
00139 
00140   friend class NT_iterator_list_o<T>;
00141 };
00142 
00143 
00144 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00145 
00151 template<class T> class NT_iterator_list_o
00152 {
00153 public:
00154   NT_iterator_list_o(const NT_list_o<T> &);
00155   
00156   void next(); // advance current position
00157   void reset();
00158 
00159    const T& current() const; // info of current element
00160    NTbool at_end() const;
00161 
00162 private:
00163    NT_link_list_o<T>* cursor() const { return _pre ? _pre->_next : _list._head; }
00164 
00165    const NT_list_o<T>& _list;
00166    NT_link_list_o<T>* _pre;
00167 };
00168 
00169 //***************************************************************************
00170 
00175 template<class T> const T& NT_link_list_o<T>::defval()
00176 {  static T t;
00177    return t;
00178 }
00179 
00180 //............................................................................
00181 
00182 /* RECEIVES:   i - the information to store in the link
00183                n - pointer to next link
00184 */
00185 template<class T> NT_link_list_o<T>::NT_link_list_o(const T& i, NT_link_list_o<T>* n) :
00186    _info(i),
00187    _next(n)
00188 {}
00189 
00190 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00191 
00192 template<class T> NT_list_o<T>::NT_list_o() :
00193    _head(0),
00194    _tail(0),
00195    _pre(0),
00196    _len(0)
00197 {}
00198 
00199 //............................................................................
00200 
00201 template<class T> NT_list_o<T>::~NT_list_o()
00202 {  free();
00203 }
00204 
00205 //............................................................................
00206 
00207 template<class T> NT_list_o<T>::NT_list_o(const NT_list_o<T>& b)
00208 {  copy(b);
00209 }
00210 
00211 //............................................................................
00212 
00213 template<class T> const NT_list_o<T>& NT_list_o<T>::operator=(const NT_list_o<T>& b)
00214 {  if (this != &b)
00215    {  free();
00216       copy(b);
00217    }
00218    return *this;
00219 }
00220 
00221 //............................................................................
00222 
00223 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::free()
00224 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* p = _head;
00225    while(p != 0)
00226    {  NT_link_list_o<T>* q = p;
00227       p = p->_next;
00228       delete q;
00229    }
00230 }
00231 
00232 //............................................................................
00233 
00234 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::copy(const NT_list_o<T>& b)
00235 {  _len = b._len;
00236    _pre = _head = 0;
00237 
00238    NT_link_list_o<T>* pa = 0;
00239    for (NT_link_list_o<T>* pb = b._head; pb != 0; pb = pb->_next)
00240    {  NT_link_list_o<T>* pnew = new NT_link_list_o<T>(pb->_info, 0);
00241       NT_ASSERT_MEM(pnew);
00242       if (pa)
00243          pa = pa->_next = pnew;
00244       else
00245          pa = _head = pnew;
00246       if (b._pre == pb) _pre = pa;
00247    }
00248    _tail = pa;
00249 }
00250 
00251 //............................................................................
00252 
00253 /* PURPOSE:    empty the list
00254 */
00255 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::empty()
00256 {  free();
00257    _head = 0;
00258    _tail = 0;
00259    _pre = 0;
00260    _len = 0;
00261 }
00262 
00263 //............................................................................
00264 
00267 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::reset()
00268 {  _pre = 0;
00269 }
00270 
00271 //............................................................................
00272 
00273 /* RETURNS:    TRUE iff the iterator is at the end of the list
00274 */
00275 template<class T> NTbool NT_list_o<T>::at_end() const
00276 {  return cursor() == 0;/* NOT NT_FALSE :) */
00277 }
00278 
00279 //............................................................................
00280 
00283 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::next()
00284 {  if (!_pre) _pre = _head;
00285    else if (_pre->_next) _pre = _pre->_next;
00286    // do not advance past the tail of the list
00287 }
00288 
00289 //............................................................................
00290 
00293 template<class T> T& NT_list_o<T>::current()
00294 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* cur = cursor();
00295    NT_ASSERT_PRECOND(cur);
00296    return cur->_info;
00297 }
00298 
00299 //............................................................................
00300 
00303 template<class T> const T& NT_list_o<T>::current() const
00304 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* cur = cursor();
00305    return cur ? cur->_info : NT_link_list_o<T>::defval();
00306 }
00307 
00308 //............................................................................
00309 
00312 template<class T> const T& NT_list_o<T>::head() const
00313 {  return _head ? _head->_info : NT_link_list_o<T>::defval();
00314 }
00315 
00316 //............................................................................
00317 
00320 template<class T> const T& NT_list_o<T>::tail() const
00321 {  return _tail ? _tail->_info : NT_link_list_o<T>::defval();
00322 }
00323 
00324 //............................................................................
00325 
00329 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::insert(T n)
00330 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* p = new NT_link_list_o<T>(n, cursor());
00331    NT_ASSERT_MEM(p);
00332 
00333    if (_pre)
00334    {  _pre->_next = p;
00335       if (_pre == _tail) _tail = p;
00336    }
00337    else
00338    {  if (_head == 0) _tail = p;
00339       _head = p;
00340    }
00341 
00342    _pre = p;
00343    _len++;
00344 };
00345 
00346 //............................................................................
00347 
00351 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::insert_head(T n)
00352 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* p = new NT_link_list_o<T>(n, _head);
00353    NT_ASSERT_MEM(p);
00354    _head = p;
00355    _len++;
00356 }
00357 
00358 //............................................................................
00359 
00363 template<class T> void NT_list_o<T>::insert_tail(T n)
00364 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* p = new NT_link_list_o<T>(n, 0);
00365    NT_ASSERT_MEM(p);
00366    if (_head == 0) _head = _tail = p;
00367    else
00368    {  _tail->_next = p;
00369       _tail = p;
00370    }
00371    _len++;
00372 }
00373 
00374 //............................................................................
00375 
00379 template<class T> T NT_list_o<T>::remove()
00380 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* cur = cursor();
00381    if (!cur) return NT_link_list_o<T>::defval();
00382    if (_tail == cur) _tail = _pre;
00383    if (_pre)
00384       _pre->_next = cur->_next;
00385    else
00386       _head = cur->_next;
00387    T r = cur->_info;
00388    delete cur;
00389    _len--;
00390    return r;
00391 }
00392 
00393 //............................................................................
00394 
00397 template<class T> int NT_list_o<T>::length() const
00398 {  return _len;
00399 }
00400 
00405 template<class T> NT_iterator_list_o<T>::NT_iterator_list_o(const NT_list_o<T>& l)
00406 :  _list(l),
00407    _pre(0)
00408 {}
00409 
00410 //............................................................................
00411 
00414 template<class T> void NT_iterator_list_o<T>::reset()
00415 {  _pre = 0;
00416 }
00417 
00418 //............................................................................
00419 
00422 template<class T> NTbool NT_iterator_list_o<T>::at_end() const
00423 {  return cursor() == 0;
00424 }
00425 
00426 //............................................................................
00427 
00430 template<class T> void NT_iterator_list_o<T>::next()
00431 {  if (!_pre) _pre = _list._head;
00432    else if (_pre->_next) _pre = _pre->_next;
00433    // do not advance past the tail of the list
00434 }
00435 
00436 //............................................................................
00437 
00440 template<class T> const T& NT_iterator_list_o<T>::current() const
00441 {  NT_link_list_o<T>* cur = cursor();
00442    return cur ? cur->_info : NT_link_list_o<T>::defval();
00443 }
